export var validatePassword=function validatePassword(password,confirmPassword){if(password!==confirmPassword){alert("Passwords do not match.");return false;}if(password.length<6){alert("Password must be at least 6 characters.");return false;}if(!/\d/.test(password)){alert("Password must contain at least one number.");return false;}return true;};//Alvási idő beállítása
export var sleep=function sleep(seconds){return new Promise(function(resolve){return setTimeout(resolve,seconds*1000);});};
